ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-neg | |- -u A = ( 0 - A ) |
| 2 |  | #P_0cn | |- 0 e. CC |
| 3 |  | #P_subcl | |- ( ( 0 e. CC /\ A e. CC ) -> ( 0 - A ) e. CC ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_mpan | |- ( A e. CC -> ( 0 - A ) e. CC ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( A e. CC -> -u A e. CC ) |
